body: Saying that the nice properties in the deterministic case don't hold in the non-deterministic case (and are equivalent to this), and concluding that we're going to go with something that doesn't ever work is weird tbh.
body_html: Saying that the nice properties in the deterministic case don't hold in the non-deterministic case (and are equivalent to this), and concluding that we're going to go with something that doesn't ever work is weird tbh.
